str2: A primary particle; but, and, etc.
If. A primary particle of conditionality; if, whether, that, etc.

str2: To hope, hope for, expect, trust. From elpis; to expect or confide.

str2: (primarily physical), I look, see, perceive, discern. A primary verb; to look at.

str2: To expect eagerly, wait for eagerly, look for. From apo and ekdechomai; to expect fully.
Endurance, steadfastness, patient waiting for. From hupomeno; cheerful endurance, constancy.
